not_active.label: start
not_active.text:
"Capitan Ratsevich, a veteran of the Great Rat War, at your service!
Hmmm... say I haven't seen you around here. You are not a cat spy are you?"

responses.text: "The revolution could use your military experience Capitan."
"No need for a washed up officer. Who knows where your loyalties lie..."

not_active.label: rejected
not_active.text:
"I hope you reconsider com-rat.
I have every reason to hate the cats.
You know in the Battle of Ratsburg..."

not_active.label: accepted
not_active.text:
"A revolution you say. I heard the com-rats were organizing something.
I would gladly help. If only I had my trusty weapon. The cats took my toothpick you see."

active.label: just_checking
active.text:
"Have you found my toothpick?
You know I named it - Katya - thats how I call it."

responses.text: "I found a toothpick. Is that it?"

active.label: quest_finished
active.text:
"Thank you! My dear Katya...
I will start drawing up battle plans immediately."

done.label: nothing_to_see
done.text:
"Hmm... We can set up an ambush right here...
And maybe distract the main cat force while we do it."
